name: Rubber cat
description:
Rubber cat is a small game about a rubber ball that is also a cat. 

Made for the Secret Santa Jam.

Controls:

A & D to move horizontally

Space to gain downwards momentum

You will bounce when coming to contact with ground because you are a rubber ball.

The movement is very janky sometimes, there is no audio and the game is very short. But i still hope you enjoy it. 

Note: there are two paths so pick the one you want, or go both ways!
